results.title: King to keep his mother's Royal Ascot tradition alive
results.subtitle: The Telegraph UK
results.body: Charles III will mirror Elizabeth II's devotion and attend every day of the prestigious horse racing festival.

results.title: Kate Middleton Channels Queen Elizabeth's Final Buckingham Palace Balcony Appearance
results.subtitle: Town and Country Mag
results.body: The Princess of Wales, wearing a bright green dress by Andrew Gn and a hat by Philip Treacy, appeared to channel the last appearance Queen Elizabeth ever made on the Buckingham Palace balcony during her Platinum Jubilee weekend last year.

results.title: King takes part in first Trooping the Colour ceremony as monarch
results.subtitle: The Independent
results.body: This is the first time Charles has taken part in the annual ceremony on Horse Guards Parade in Whitehall as the head of state.
